label: spam
subject: Our Company Has Announced Additional Openings For New Employees. [letter id: q83626093c]
body: "No subject do I broach, however, to those who have no eager desire to learn; no encouraging hint do I give to those who show no anxiety to speak out their ideas; nor have I anything more to say to those who, after I have made clear one corner of the subject, cannot from that give me the other three."
